succulents.name: Crassula capitella
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires bright indoor light or full sun, infrequent watering and great drainage.

succulents.name: Crassula 'Garnet Lotus'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires filtered/partial sun, or low indoor light, infrequent watering and great drainage.

succulents.name: Crassula 'Imperialis'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires filtered/partial sun, or bright indoor light, infrequent watering and great drainage.

succulents.name: Echeveria 'Black Prince'
succulents.care: Needs bright indoor light or filtered/partial sun, great drainage and infrequent watering.

succulents.name: Echeveria setosa
succulents.care: Needs bright indoor light or filtered/partial sun, great drainage and infrequent watering.

succulents.name: Graptoveria 'Lovely Rose'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires bright indoor light or full sun, great drainage and infrequent watering.

succulents.name: Gasteria bicolor var. liliputana
succulents.care: Tolerates low light conditions. Plant in deep pot as it grows deep roots and cannot withstand standing water. Water deeply when soil is completely dry.

succulents.name: Gasteria 'Frosty'
succulents.care: Tolerates low light conditions. Plant in deep pot as it grows deep roots and cannot withstand standing water. Water deeply when soil is completely dry.

succulents.name: Gasteraloe 'Royal Highness'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Will tolerate drought and low-light conditions. Require good drainage and infrequent watering.

succulents.name: Sedeveria 'Pink Granite'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires bright indoor light or partial/filtered sunlight. Water infrequently.

succulents.name: Sedeveria 'Jet Beads'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires bright indoor light or partial/filtered sunlight. Water infrequently.

succulents.name: Sedeveria 'Blue Burrito'
succulents.care: Soft succulent that will not survive a hard frost. Requires bright indoor light or partial/filtered sunlight. Water infrequently.

succulents.name: Sedum 'Lime Zinger'
succulents.care: Frost hardy and thrives outdoors with full sun and great drainage. Drought tolerant.

succulents.name: Sedum dasyphyllum 'Himalayan Skies'
succulents.care: Frost hardy and thrives outdoors with full sun and great drainage. Drought tolerant.

succulents.name: Sedum allantoides
succulents.care: Soft Sedum will not survive a hard frost. They require bright indoor light or full sun, great drainage, and infrequent waterings.
